data.actual_result: Always the English strings are used.
data.expected_result: Strings should be translated to the specific language. Best solution would be to use the iPhone date picker.
data.short_description: [iPad only] Date picker UI always with English strings
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your language to any Non-English language like German - Go to any server - Open the search - Select any date filter like `before`- Workaround to open the date picker: Click the backspace key, click the space key and then he backspace key again - Observe the strings there
